name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens share the various difficult situations they have seen in Zhuozhou
The last netizen’s comment makes people feel cold

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Phoenix News
After the 2021 Henan flood, nearly 10 billion yuan of post-disaster reconstruction funds ran into problems.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Zhuozhou citizens made a video to ask where the officials of Zhuozhou have gone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Two contributions about the Blue Sky Rescue Team

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 4, Erzhan Forest Farm, Dongjing Town, Ning'an City, Mudanjiang City

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up to the incident
It was reported online that two elderly people died in the car
But the news reported no casualties

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 3, at Xipogen, Tangjiazhuang Village, Zhaogezhuang Town, Laishui County, Baoding, Hebei, villagers burned paper and fished out bodies for their dead parents. "Other people's houses are fine, why did ours become like this... Mom and Dad, rest in peace..." Some netizens said that the local village cadres said there were no casualties when they were interviewed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Local villagers said 14 people in the village were killed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Breaking news: Give me back my home!
August 4, Bazhou. The flood caused a large area of Bazhou City to be flooded, causing heavy losses, houses collapsed, and tens of thousands of people were left homeless and bankrupt, but the news reported that it was caused by heavy rain
Angry local villagers went to the government building to protest
A banner was hung at the scene: "Give me back my home, it was clearly caused by the flood, but they said it was caused by rain!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The reason for the villagers' dissatisfaction comes from this official news:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On-site staff negotiated with the public and stopped them from recording. The public responded: I’ll record you!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Breaking news! A violent conflict broke out in front of the Bazhou government building. A group of people in black holding police shields beat up villagers!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/GnKFZKCdfJ

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/EmbqwuP4RH

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Cause of the incident:
The villagers thought it was clearly a flood discharge, but CCTV published an article claiming that it was caused by rainfall in many parts of the state, and questioned whether the public rescue team was putting on a show at the scene

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
About an hour ago, the Bazhou People's Government issued a "Letter to the General Folks" 
Acknowledging that the disaster was caused by the use of the flood storage area to release flood water, thanking the folks in the flood storage area, and will do a good job in disaster compensation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/w0NEueqtZY

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Supplementary video

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The current situation of Erzhantun, Dongjingcheng, Mudanjiang City, Heilongjiang Province.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some netizens have discovered that at present, all official media news about "domestic 28nm lithography machines" have been deleted.
Currently, the search for the article "How domestic lithography machines break through" on Xinhuanet on July 31 has shown that it has been deleted
On Douyin and Weibo, all the official media news about "domestic 28nm lithography machines" have disappeared, leaving only some self-media comments.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Currently, a screenshot of a Southern Weekend reporter describing the situation in Zhuozhou is going viral online.
He cursed the local officials as "worse than beasts."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 3, Beijing's Mentougou District announced a reduction or exemption of parking fees on some disaster-affected roads.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Current water level of Zhuozhou Middle School:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/kxgOkfNPBK

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Zhuozhou netizens contributed:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a recording of the Zhengzhou University Design Institute was circulated online.
In the recording, an employee reported the situation to the director, saying that he wanted to rest on the weekend. The director said, "Not allowed. Everyone has to work overtime."
The employee then took out the labor law and said that the law stipulates that he can rest. The director said, "You are telling me about the labor law, right? Then go and sue me."
Afterwards, the director discovered the recording and began to snatch the phone of the person involved, and denounced the person as a "child without conscience."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/bn8bzIODvQ

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 4, the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League issued a document to strictly investigate the falsification of employment rates in colleges and universities. Fortunately, the investigation started in August when all the fresh graduates left. If the investigation started in June, it is estimated that more than half of the college students in the country would not graduate this year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
About an hour ago, Xinhua News Agency published an article: 
"Together in the face of adversity, people first - the Party Central Committee with Xi Jinping as the core firmly and forcefully directs Beijing's flood prevention, flood fighting and disaster relief" 
The article states that under the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core, the broad masses of cadres and the people will unite as one and rise to the challenge, and will surely win the victory in flood prevention, flood fighting and disaster relief, and ensure the safe operation of the capital city.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @ZelenskyyUa

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @hawking197428 It’s hard to say whether the banned or unbanned people are more daring to tell the truth

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A user on Bilibili was banned for 15 days for posting a picture comparing the altitudes of Xiongan and Zhuozhou

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the disaster situation in Gaobeidian, Baoding, Hebei Province: Xincheng Town, Alanruo Temple, Kaishan Temple, Ziquan Middle School and surrounding villages were all flooded.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 5, a Zhuozhou netizen took a real-life photo of the current Zhuozhou material warehouse. In the video, a large amount of materials were piled up in the warehouse, but the village could not collect them. Only those with certificates at the township level or above could come to collect them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: 68 kilometers away from Xiongan New Area, rescue workers drove motorboats to search for victims.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Near Fengjiazhuang, Yi County, Hebei Province, mud, sand and gravel accumulated to about one meter after the flood receded.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Puppy waiting for its owner in the flood

content:
Netizen contribution
August 5, overlooking Bazhou, Hebei from the plane

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the official announcement of the previous day, a man was detained for staying on the embankment in the flood discharge area and refusing to leave.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of August 4, a deputy mayor of Shulan City, Jilin Province was washed away by floods and lost contact.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Hot search on Weibo: 
People are supreme but the people are not there

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to Xinhua News Agency, four public officials including Luo Xudong, deputy mayor of Shulan City, lost contact during the flood relief operation.
